name: Blue Cash Everyday® Card from American Express review

overview_category_title.title: Rewards Rate
overview_category_title.reviews: 3% cash back at U.S. supermarkets (up to $6,000 per year in purchases, then 1%) - 3% cash back at U.S. gas stations (up to $6,000 per year in purchases, then 1%) - 3% cash back on U.S. online retail purchases (up to $6,000 per year in purchases, then 1%) - 1% cash back general purchases - Terms apply

overview_category_title.title: Introductory Bonus
overview_category_title.reviews: Earn up to $250 back — $100 as a statement credit when you spend $2,000 in purchases in your first six months and up to $150 back when you use your card to check out via PayPal with merchants (as 20% back in statement credits) in your first six months - Terms apply

overview_category_title.title: Annual Bonus
overview_category_title.reviews: None

overview_category_title.title: Rewards Redemption
overview_category_title.reviews: Cash back doesn’t expire - No minimum redemption amount - No rotating categories - $6,000 yearly purchase limit on each 3% cash back category - Can’t transfer rewards or combine them from other cards

overview_category_title.title: American Express Customer Service Ratings
